overview.en: ArtemisChain aims to create a new business ecosystem that combines blockchain and IoT, which will increase product value, improve people's living infrastructure and promote the evolution of smart home equipment, and to create a new trading model between supply and demand that benefits to both parties and the data source is traceable and safe.  In short, we use blockchain technology and  token economic model to promote the upgrading of civil infrastructure equipment, so that people can use best high-tech products to improve their quality of life at a lower cost.
overview.zh: ArtemisChain合益链旨在打造区块链和物联网结合的全新商业生态，提高产品价值，改善民众生活基础设施。推进智能化家庭基础设备进化，打造质量可信，源头可溯，数据安全互惠的众方得益的供需新交易模式。 简单来说，就是科学运用区块链技术跟token经济模型来促进民用基础设备的升级改造，让民众用更低的成本就可以用上一些顶级的科技产品，改善生活品质。
